summary: Completed comprehensive frontend testing of duty scheduler assignment system. Main agent's fix for 'Add Personnels' button overlay issue successful - all E2E functionality now working perfectly at 100% success rate.

issues: HTML hydration errors in console for select/option elements with span wrappers - non-functional issue

passed_tests: E2E Flow: Click time cell → panel opens → select personnel → click 'Add Personnels' → assignment block appears + toast + panel closes
Available/Unavailable tabs switch personnel list correctly (6 available, 2 unavailable)
Personnel search filters by callsign/name (search 'John' returns 1 result)
Close button closes the panel correctly
Assignment blocks display duty code (G1), time range (0600-0800, etc), and personnel name (John Miller)
Add Personnels button shows correct selection count and is clickable
Toast notifications appear after successful assignment creation
Assignment blocks have proper hover tooltips with full info
Assignment blocks are properly styled with blue background/border
Multiple assignments can be created and display in correct time slots
Panel time selectors auto-populate based on clicked time slot
